Title: Provides for a pilot solicitation of climate leadership and community protection act projects relating to wind energy in Lake Erie and requirements therefor
Summary: Provides for a pilot project in furtherance of climate leadership and community protection act clean energy standards in Lake Erie; establishes standards for wind energy procured therefrom.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to a pilot project in furtherance of climate leadership and community protection act clean energy standards in Lake Erie and establishing standards for wind energy procured therefrom
